name: Evil Dead Ducks: Arena
description: My new game is called "Evil Dead Ducks: Arena". It takes place 10 years after events of NES-game Duck Hunt. The main hero's dog is dead and he is driving to the old hunting places to spread its ash across fields. But the whole place changed - burned grass, constant fog and sounds of zombie ducks in the distance. Wait.. What? Yeah, they are here to get their revenge after all this years...
